00001 <h2>Licensing</h2>
00002 <p>
00003         MiniBatteryLogger is shareware software. You may use it unregistered as long as you wish, anyway if
00004         you use it everyday you should register a license.
00005 </p>
00006 <p>
00007         I&rsquo;d be glad to hear your opinions and comments. Drop me your suggestions
00008         for improvement. Feedback from users will greatly influence future development.
00009 </p>
00010 <p>
00011         Redistribution of this application is forbidden without prior authorization.
00012         If you&rsquo;d like to include it in a magazine CD/software bundle,
00013         please <?php $this->link_to(l('contact me'), array('controller' => 'contact', 'query_string' => 'subject=MiniBatteryLogger+distribution')); ?>.
00014 </p>
